<dict>
        <key>AllDisks</key>
        <array>
                <string>disk0</string>
                <string>disk0s1</string>
                <string>disk0s2</string>
                <string>disk1</string>
        </array>
        <key>AllDisksAndPartitions</key>
        <array>
                <dict>
                        <key>DeviceIdentifier</key>
                        <string>disk0</string>
                        <key>Partitions</key>
                        <array>
                                <dict>
                                        <key>Size</key>
                                        <integer>210000000</integer>
                                </dict>
                                <dict>
                                        <key>Size</key>
                                        <integer>132000000000</integer>
                                </dict>
                        </array>
                        <key>Size</key>
                        <integer>200000000000</integer>
                </dict>
        </array>
</dict>
</plist>
